name: Android App Development
description: Android is the great mobile operating system which offered by search engine giant Google Inc. its based on Open Source Technology, Android software stack are integrated with lots of technologies supporting programming languages such as C, C++, Java, XML etc. Moreover, android system supports numerous industry specific applications, as well as high end entertainment application for individual, business and corporates. With release in 2008, android mobile devices are become the fans favorite & along with its huge supports of numerous applications, We are working with android app from 2010 till now here in Bangladesh.
title1: DCIT ltd. as an Android App Development Company in Bangladesh
p1:
As a renowned name in Website Design and Development, also software industry based in Dhaka Bangladesh, NIBiz Soft is very prominent as a software development comapny and also remarkable on various Mobile Application Development, Open Source Software and Microsoft technologies. As an android app development company in bangladesh Over 10 years of experience, along with skilled development team of professional mobile app developers we have satisfied our each clients and every requirement of Android App Development. We understand the requirement of each and every android mobile application development project is unique, including other application development. We perform a good study of your android development requirement and make a scope of analysis which can give you the crystal clear image of your project starting from beginning to ending. This will also help you or client to justify the timeframe or deadline to develop the application, pricing structure as well as how your project will affect your targeted market.
This strategy will allows us to deliver you comprehended solutions to meet the exact expectation of our clients. Whether there is a requirement of multi-platform application like iPhone , Android or Windows Phone or a dedicated application, our android development team will design the best solution for you always. Our android app development team is skilled on the latest Android SDK provide by Google to give you the utmost solutions in android development.

name: Digital Marketing Service
description: DCIT ltd provides digital marketing service in Dhaka Bangladesh.Digital Marketing means Promoting a product or brand which is very much essential to make a business successful.It increases visibility on web to your potential customers.Its influence can't be described in words.As much as you are visible,you are getting closer to your business goal.Perfect Digital Marketing strategy can reach your business to the apex.Its your most important strategy to expand your business. DCIT ltd is introducing you with Optimistic Digital.Optimistic Digital is a full service digital agency that specializes in creative campaigns, website design,mobile app development,and online marketing.Our clients range from renowned companies to innovative startups.Optimistic Digital is a concern of one of the ever green IT firm DCITltd who has won dozens of industry awards,and has reoccurring features in major organizations such as The Bangladesh Government, U.S Aid Save the Children),Fedex,UK,Stock Exchange.Optimistic Digital has a vision of becoming an industry leader in the digital marketing landscape.for more information visit www.Optimistic.Digital.

name: Built Website for you in 7 days, Start getting request from your targeted clients.Get the best website development service in bd at DCIT ltd.
description:
ebsite should reflect your business or brand, colors and image. Our development team can create a unique custom designed website to suit your requirements, leaving your web visitors with a professional impression of your business. DCIT ltd provides the best website development service in Bangladesh. 
 Our Website Designs/Development come with smart features, Search Engine SEO and Site Editor which is an exclusive product of DCIT ltd and allows you to update your website on the fly.Contact us to know more details or to place order.Get delivery on time,enjoy our service. 
 Your website is the most important component of your company’s marketing plan. It’s the central hub for your messaging and content marketing efforts. All other marketing materials should support and drive traffic to your website. As website design and development technology has progressed over the years, you now have more digital marketing tools than ever before. 
 Social media, blogs and mobile allow businesses and nonprofits to easily target and convert users by driving them to a well-designed website with a positive user experience or UX. 
 We work with you to develop a user experience which delivers value to your audience. Value means repeat visits and referrals via social media and other channels. Using our years of experience and research, Wood Street’s web design and development solutions are customized to help you achieve your digital marketing goals.

name: Search Engine Submission
title1: Search Engine Submission on a Monthly Basis
p1: Submit and resubmit your site to 400+ sites and directories. Monthly updates keeps your web site finely tuned in search engines and increase your visibility rapidly.
p2: Search Engine Booster uses real-time search engine data and analysis tools to report on your web site’s performance. Compare the search results with your  competitors.
p3: Receive live updates includes new Search Engines and Directories and also updated tools for the best Search Engine Optimisation procedures.
